identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

rules: Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body
Use Deep Obsidian (#0A0A0A) as primary anchor
Pair with Pure White for data clarity
Use Volt Blue (#007AFF) as kinetic trigger
Use Electric Blaze (#FF3B30) for destructive/high-intensity actions

spacing.rule: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8)

grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: High Density Grid (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4, gap-4)
grid_system.marketing: Mode A: The Tetris Grid (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-8 lg:grid-cols-12, gap-8)

alignment.optical: Add extra padding to visually center text blocks next to icons

tracing_beam.implementation: Glowing gradient line traveling around container edge

customization: Remove 'Vercel-look' by sharpening radii or using specific borders
Buttons: Sharp edges or Pill-shaped, no default rounded-md

specifics.cards: Flat background, 1px subtle border, no shadow by default. Hover: lift + shadow.
specifics.inputs: Shadcn Input, customized to match dark theme (bg-secondary)
specifics.charts: Use Shadcn chart components or Recharts directly. Colors must match palette.

hero.alt: Man in black tank top in dark gym

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts. Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'Barlow Condensed' font from Google Fonts.
2. Configure Tailwind colors in tailwind.config.js to match the 'The Performance Pro' palette.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the dark theme and includes the noise texture.
4. Build the 'Dashboard' using the Bento Grid Mode B.
5. Implement the 'Exercise Library' using a dense grid with 'Grid Borders'.
6. Use the provided images for the respective sections.
7. Ensure all charts use the defined chart colors (Volt Blue, Electric Blaze).
